info.name: Brittany Snow Tumblr Dashboard
info.description: This incorporates a semi-transparent post wrap into your dashboard; it's all grey-scale/black and white. The dashboard icons (chat/text/photo/etc) are also changed. And of course Brittany Snow is the background. (Unlike in the picture, the tumblr logo and followers/posts/likes/following/draft buttons are not changed. Those are separate codes.)
